name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: ₹6,000/year to eligible farmers, credited in 3 installments directly via DBT.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance to cover risks due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

name: PM KUSUM Scheme
description: Supports farmers to install solar irrigation pumps and grid-connected renewable power plants.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY-RAFTAAR)
description: Promotes agri-infra, entrepreneurship, and innovation in farming practices.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Encourages organic farming by forming 50-acre clusters with financial support.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Provides credit facility for farmers to meet cultivation and investment needs at low interest rates.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Expands irrigation coverage and improves water use efficiency with 'Per Drop More Crop' approach.

name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
description: Holistic development of horticulture sector covering fruits, vegetables, root crops, and spices.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Increases production and productivity of rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals.

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
description: Promotes farm mechanization through subsidies on agricultural machinery and implements.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: Medium-long term debt financing for post-harvest infrastructure with ₹1 lakh crore corpus.

name: National Livestock Mission (NLM)
description: Sustainable development of livestock sector focusing on entrepreneurship and employment.

name: Blue Revolution (Neel Kranti)
description: Integrated development and management of fisheries for economic prosperity.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)
description: Fisheries development with ₹20,050 crore investment over 5 years.

name: Electronic National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
description: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities to provide better price discovery.

name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME)
description: Support for upgrading micro food processing enterprises with ₹10,000 crore investment.

name: Interest Subvention Scheme
description: Provides short-term crop loans to farmers at subsidized interest rates of 4% per annum.

name: National Beekeeping & Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: Promotes scientific beekeeping and increases honey production and productivity.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil health cards to farmers with recommendations for nutrient management.

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Promotes sustainable agriculture practices through climate resilient technologies.

name: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana (MKSP)
description: Enhances opportunities for women in agriculture through capacity building and support.

name: National Mission on Oilseeds and Oil Palm (NMOOP)
description: Increases production and productivity of oilseeds and oil palm for edible oil security.

name: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
description: Ensures remunerative prices to farmers through MSP operations and market interventions.

name: National Agriculture Market (NAM)
description: Creates unified national market for agricultural commodities through e-platform.

name: Integrated Watershed Management Programme (IWMP)
description: Restores ecological balance through watershed management in rain-fed areas.

name: Agricultural Technology Management Agency (ATMA)
description: Decentralized extension system for technology dissemination at district level.

name: Digital Agriculture Mission
description: Uses digital technology to improve farmers' access to information, services, and markets.

name: National Programme for Dairy Development (NPDD)
description: Focuses on productivity enhancement and quality improvement in dairy sector.

name: Crop Residue Management Scheme
description: Promotes in-situ management of crop residue to reduce pollution and improve soil health.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maan-Dhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
description: Voluntary pension scheme for small and marginal farmers with ₹3,000 monthly pension.

name: Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme (WBCIS)
description: Insurance coverage based on weather parameters for quick claim settlement.

name: National Adaptation Fund for Climate Change
description: Supports adaptation measures for climate-vulnerable sectors including agriculture.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (PM-KUSUM)
description: Comprehensive scheme for solar pump installation and grid-connected solar power.

name: National Horticulture Board (NHB) Schemes
description: Various schemes for horticulture development, processing, and marketing support.

name: Central Sector Scheme on Formation & Promotion of FPOs
description: Formation and promotion of 10,000 Farmer Producer Organizations with financial support.

name: National Programme for Organic Production (NPOP)
description: Promotes organic farming and provides certification for organic produce.

name: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)
description: Provides rural road connectivity to enhance agricultural market access.

name: National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (NREGA)
description: Provides employment opportunities in rural areas including agricultural activities.

name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission
description: Indigenous cattle breed development and conservation for milk production enhancement.

name: National Bamboo Mission (NBM)
description: Promotes bamboo cultivation and development of bamboo-based enterprises.
